message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, I'm not comfortable going that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000. This price still leaves room for profit for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
